name: Pixels and Sprites
description:
Hello and welcome to Pixels and Sprites, a EDM Rhythm game about trying to get the highest score on all the levels.

This game is my first ever proper game which took me 2-4 months to make so i hope you enjoy it.

Features.

  • 11 Levels all with different difficulty and design.
  • Music from artists such as Boom Kitty, The Fat Rat and Hinkik
  • Ranking system that makes you want to go back and try to do better
  • Other various things that are cool i guess...

Info before you play the game:
1. If your sensitive to flashing lights/colours i strongly suggest you don't play this game
2. If you download the game and there is no audio go to settings
3. If you enjoy the game please consider donating to help me make better games. 
4. If you find any bugs/issues feel free to contact me at @Mostly_RC on twitter

Credits

Code, Design & Artwork: - Stinky Squidkid
Artwork: PrincessLuna663
Music, csx42Gaming, EpsiDev, Yung Logos, Underbelly, Boom Kitty, The Fat Rat, Astedroid, 1f1n1ty, Xtrullor, Azazal, Said, Hinkik, DoctorNoSense
Trailer Music: Djjaner
